Enchantment 2

Eyes of the Condors

MA Nazca

Ritual
A2
spell id [id]: 375
effect number [effect_number]: 85
damage [damage]: 36
range [provrange]: 4 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 1A
Remote Enchant Province - Gem Duration:36 ?
Hidden Enchantment :1
Cannot target geo mask : (Sea)
The Condor is sacred to the people of Nazca. It is considered a messenger of the sun and herald of storms. No other bird can soar at such heights, thus Condor scouts are rarely seen and almost impossible to catch. With this ritual the caster borrows the all perceiving eyes of the Condors and send the sacred birds to a distant province to scry.
